details.description: A tunnel through this steep barricade is rigged to collapse. If a kobold spends one action to throw a lever, the tunnel collapses on the next creature to pass through.
details.disable: Thievery DC 18 (trained) to carefully trigger the collapse without entering the tunnel or DC 22 (trained) to brace the tunnel so it is safe to pass through.

description.value:
Trigger A creature crawls into the tunnel in the collapsing barricade after the trap is activated with the lever

Effect The barricade collapses on the creature, who must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:22|traits:damaging-effect] save.}.

Critical Success The creature takes no damage and escapes the barricade, emerging into a safe space on either side of it.

Success The creature takes [[/r {1d6+2}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6+2 bludgeoning damage} from collapsing debris and [[/r {1d6+2}[slashing]]]{1d6+2 slashing damage} from broken glass before emerging on the opposite side of the barricade from the one they entered.

Failure The creature takes [[/r {2d6+4}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6+4 bludgeoning damage} from collapsing debris and [[/r {2d6+4}[slashing]]]{2d6+4 slashing damage} from broken glass before emerging on the opposite side of the barricade from the one they entered.

Critical Failure As a failure, and the creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Immobilized]{Immobilized} beneath the barricade until they or another creature succeed at a @Check[type:athletics|dc:22|name:Escape Barricade] check to pull them free. They can still be targeted, touched, and otherwise interacted with by creatures on either side of the barrier.
